General.Name: Yusin Holding Corp
General.Description: Yusin Holding Corp. manufactures and sells vehicle's brake systems in Asia, North America, Central and South America, Europe, and internationally. Its products include brake master cylinders, brake cylinders, clutch master cylinders, clutch slave cylinder, brake calipers, brake pads, bicycle brake systems, and other related components for the automobile brake system. The company also manufactures and sells various vehicles parts, as well as involved in the general investment activity. Yusin Holding Corp. was founded in 1992 and is based in Chiayi, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.381, Wufong North Road, Chiayi, Taiwan
